title: zk init  error
body:

i want to know how to fix it .  thx.

Hey @zu19890223, is this still an issue? we could not replicate it locally

Maybe try again with wasm-pack 0.10.1 ? (related [issue](https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync/pull/358/files#diff-942e74477ab85dfdff6364cafc5bd3362e4e0c47f1cb84d4496b2a2b0bf6c634R8))

@adrianchifor, I was running into the same issue. I had to uninstall wasm-pack and reinstall wasm-pack with the specified version like mentioned in this MR
https://github.com/matter-labs/zksync/pull/358
Cool, thanks for confirming! Merged #358 so will close this one
